entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of drizzle in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
